DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study characterize physical growth , body composition , dietary intake , neurobehavioral development , brain function infant child feed mostly breast-milk , milk-based formula soy-based formula first year life . Children follow age 2 month age 6 year .
DOC.brief_title: Study Early Infant Diet Growth Development
DOC.criteria: Healthy Infants Birth weight = 6 9 lb Mostly feed breast milk , milkbased formula , soybased formula Mother 18 year age Unhealthy pregnancy Illness pregnancy child could interfere study parameter
